statements: SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE id = 'some_uuid';
SELECT policy_name, created_at FROM security_policies WHERE policy_type = 'permission';
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM security_policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_type FROM security_policies WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_type = 'access_control' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT policy_type FROM security_policies;
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE policy_name = 'admin_policy';
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE created_at < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1' DAY;
SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM created_at)) FROM security_policies;
SELECT policy_name, COUNT(*) FROM security_policies GROUP BY policy_name;
SELECT policy_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM security_policies GROUP BY policy_type HAVING count > 2;
SELECT policy_name, EXTRACT(DOW FROM created_at) AS day_of_week FROM security_policies;
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_name = 'default_policy' AND policy_type = 'access_control';
SELECT * FROM security_policies ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT policy_name, LENGTH(policy_description) AS description_length FROM security_policies;
SELECT policy_name FROM security_policies WHERE LENGTH(policy_name) > 10;
SELECT policy_name, policy_type FROM security_policies WHERE id IN ('uuid1', 'uuid2', 'uuid3');
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_name = 'policy1' OR policy_type = 'access_control';
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_type = 'firewall';
SELECT id, policy_name, created_at FROM security_policies WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE LENGTH(policy_description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_type = 'vpn' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT policy_name, COUNT(*) AS total_policies FROM security_policies GROUP BY policy_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT id, policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE policy_description LIKE '%security%';
SELECT policy_name, created_at, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM created_at) AS year FROM security_policies ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT policy_type, COUNT(DISTINCT policy_name) AS unique_names FROM security_policies GROUP BY policy_type HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT policy_name) > 2;
SELECT id, policy_name FROM security_policies WHERE LENGTH(policy_name) < 10 AND policy_type <> 'firewall';
SELECT AVG(LENGTH(policy_name)) AS avg_name_length FROM security_policies;
SELECT policy_name, created_at FROM security_policies WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM created_at) = 6;
SELECT policy_name, COUNT(*) AS total_policies FROM security_policies WHERE policy_type = 'firewall' GROUP BY policy_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT id, policy_name, policy_type FROM security_policies WHERE policy_name LIKE 'A%' AND POLICY_type <> 'VPN';
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE policy_type IN ('firewall', 'vpn');
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT policy_name, created_at FROM security_policies WHERE policy_type = 'vpn' AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM created_at) = 2022;
SELECT id, policy_type, COUNT(*) AS policy_count FROM security_policies GROUP BY policy_type ORDER BY policy_count DESC;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE LENGTH(policy_description) > 200 OR policy_type = 'vpn';
SELECT policy_name, EXTRACT(DAY FROM created_at) AS day FROM security_policies WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM created_at) = 12;
SELECT policy_type, AVG(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM created_at)) AS avg_year FROM security_policies GROUP BY policy_type ORDER BY avg_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies;
SELECT * FROM compliance_monitoring;
SELECT monitoring_id, monitoring_date FROM compliance_monitoring;
SELECT policy_name, monitoring_result FROM security_policies, compliance_monitoring;
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_name = 'Sample Policy';
SELECT * FROM security_policies ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT policy_name, monitoring_date FROM security_policies INNER JOIN compliance_monitoring ON security_policies.policy_id = compliance_monitoring.policy_id;
SELECT policy_id, MAX(monitoring_date) FROM compliance_monitoring GROUP BY policy_id;
SELECT AVG(policy_id) FROM security_policies;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM compliance_monitoring;
SELECT policy_id, COUNT(*) FROM compliance_monitoring GROUP BY policy_id;
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT policy_name, monitoring_result FROM security_policies LEFT JOIN compliance_monitoring ON security_policies.policy_id = compliance_monitoring.policy_id;
SELECT DISTINCT policy_name FROM security_policies;
SELECT policy_name, COUNT(*) FROM security_policies INNER JOIN compliance_monitoring ON security_policies.policy_id = compliance_monitoring.policy_id GROUP BY policy_name;
SELECT policy_name, monitoring_result FROM security_policies JOIN compliance_monitoring ON security_policies.policy_id = compliance_monitoring.policy_id WHERE monitoring_result = 'Failed';
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM security_policies UNION SELECT policy_id, monitoring_result FROM compliance_monitoring;
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id > 100;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id < 50;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE created_at < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id IN (1, 5, 10);
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_description LIKE '%security%';
SELECT s.policy_name, c.monitoring_date FROM security_policies s INNER JOIN compliance_monitoring c ON s.policy_id = c.policy_id;
SELECT s.policy_name, c.monitoring_date FROM security_policies s LEFT JOIN compliance_monitoring c ON s.policy_id = c.policy_id;
SELECT s.policy_name, c.monitoring_date FROM security_policies s RIGHT JOIN compliance_monitoring c ON s.policy_id = c.policy_id;
SELECT s.policy_name, c.monitoring_date FROM security_policies s JOIN compliance_monitoring c ON s.policy_id = c.policy_id WHERE c.monitoring_result = 'Fail';
SELECT policy_id, MAX(monitoring_date) FROM compliance_monitoring GROUP BY policy_id;
SELECT policy_id, COUNT(*) FROM compliance_monitoring GROUP BY policy_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT policy_id, AVG(CAST(SUBSTR(monitoring_result, 1, 2) AS INT)) AS avg_result FROM compliance_monitoring GROUP BY policy_id;
SELECT policy_id, COUNT(*) FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE monitoring_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY policy_id;
SELECT policy_id, SUM(CASE WHEN monitoring_result = 'Fail' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS num_failures FROM compliance_monitoring GROUP BY policy_id;
SELECT policy_name, COUNT(*) FROM security_policies GROUP BY policy_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT policy_name, MIN(monitoring_date), MAX(monitoring_date) FROM security_policies s INNER JOIN compliance_monitoring c ON s.policy_id = c.policy_id GROUP BY policy_name;

SELECT policy_id, policy_name, monitoring_date, monitoring_result FROM security_policies s INNER JOIN compliance_monitoring c ON s.policy_id = c.policy_id WHERE c.monitoring_date = (SELECT MAX(monitoring_date) FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE policy_id = s.policy_id);

SELECT policy_id, policy_name, monitoring_date, monitoring_result FROM security_policies s INNER JOIN compliance_monitoring c ON s.policy_id = c.policy_id WHERE c.monitoring_date = (SELECT MIN(monitoring_date) FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE policy_id = s.policy_id);
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, monitoring_date, monitoring_result FROM security_policies s INNER JOIN compliance_monitoring c ON s.policy_id = c.policy_id ORDER BY c.monitoring_date DESC;

SELECT policy_id, policy_name, monitoring_date, monitoring_result FROM security_policies s INNER JOIN compliance_monitoring c ON s.policy_id = c.policy_id ORDER BY monitoring_result ASC, monitoring_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityPolicies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM SecurityPolicies;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRules;
SELECT rule_name, rule_description FROM ComplianceRules;
SELECT * FROM PolicyAssignments;
SELECT policy_id, user_id, assigned_at FROM PolicyAssignments;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, created_at FROM SecurityPolicies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT rule_id, rule_name, created_at FROM ComplianceRules WHERE rule_id = 2;
SELECT assignment_id, policy_id, user_id, assigned_at FROM PolicyAssignments WHERE assignment_id = 3;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, created_at FROM SecurityPolicies WHERE policy_name = 'Example Policy';
SELECT rule_id, rule_name, created_at FROM ComplianceRules WHERE rule_name = 'Example Rule';
SELECT * FROM PolicyAssignments WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PolicyAssignments WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM SecurityPolicies ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityPolicies ORDER BY policy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRules ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRules ORDER BY rule_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyAssignments ORDER BY assigned_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyAssignments ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT count(*) FROM SecurityPolicies;
SELECT count(*) FROM ComplianceRules;
SELECT count(*) FROM PolicyAssignments;
SELECT * FROM SecurityPolicies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name FROM SecurityPolicies;
SELECT rule_name, rule_description FROM ComplianceRules WHERE rule_id = 2;
SELECT p.policy_name, a.assigned_at FROM SecurityPolicies p INNER JOIN PolicyAssignments a ON p.policy_id = a.policy_id;
SELECT p.policy_name, r.rule_name FROM SecurityPolicies p, ComplianceRules r, PolicyAssignments a WHERE p.policy_id = a.policy_id AND r.rule_id = a.rule_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SecurityPolicies;
SELECT AVG(policy_id) FROM PolicyAssignments;
SELECT DISTINCT policy_name FROM SecurityPolicies;
SELECT MAX(created_at) FROM SecurityPolicies;
SELECT MIN(created_at) FROM PolicyAssignments;
SELECT AVG(DISTINCT rule_id) FROM ComplianceRules;
SELECT p.policy_name, COUNT(a.user_id) FROM SecurityPolicies p LEFT JOIN PolicyAssignments a ON p.policy_id = a.policy_id GROUP BY p.policy_id;
SELECT p.policy_name, COUNT(a.user_id) FROM SecurityPolicies p RIGHT JOIN PolicyAssignments a ON p.policy_id = a.policy_id GROUP BY p.policy_id;
SELECT p.policy_name, COUNT(a.user_id) FROM SecurityPolicies p FULL JOIN PolicyAssignments a ON p.policy_id = a.policy_id GROUP BY p.policy_id;
SELECT p.policy_name, r.rule_name FROM SecurityPolicies p, ComplianceRules r, PolicyAssignments a WHERE p.policy_id = a.policy_id OR r.rule_id = a.rule_id;
SELECT p.policy_name, r.rule_name FROM SecurityPolicies p, ComplianceRules r, PolicyAssignments a WHERE p.policy_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND r.rule_id NOT IN (4, 5);
SELECT p.policy_name, r.rule_name FROM SecurityPolicies p, ComplianceRules r, PolicyAssignments a WHERE p.policy_name LIKE 'A%' AND r.rule_name LIKE '%B%';
SELECT p.policy_name, r.rule_name FROM SecurityPolicies p, ComplianceRules r, PolicyAssignments a WHERE p.policy_name = 'Policy1' AND r.rule_name = 'Rule1';
SELECT p.policy_name, COUNT(a.user_id) FROM SecurityPolicies p JOIN PolicyAssignments a ON p.policy_id = a.policy_id WHERE p.created_at > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY p.policy_id;
SELECT p.policy_name, COUNT(a.user_id) FROM SecurityPolicies p JOIN PolicyAssignments a ON p.policy_id = a.policy_id WHERE p.created_at < '2021-01-01' GROUP BY p.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM security_policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies;
SELECT * FROM compliance_monitoring;
SELECT monitoring_id, date_checked FROM compliance_monitoring;
SELECT * FROM configurations;
SELECT config_name, config_value FROM configurations;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT policy_name, policy_type FROM security_policies;
SELECT monitoring_id, pass_fail FROM compliance_monitoring;
SELECT config_id, config_name FROM configurations;
SELECT user_id, role FROM users;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description, policy_type FROM security_policies;
SELECT monitoring_id, date_checked, pass_fail FROM compliance_monitoring;
SELECT config_id, config_name, config_value FROM configurations;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT policy_name, policy_type, policy_description FROM security_policies;
SELECT monitoring_id, pass_fail, date_checked FROM compliance_monitoring;
SELECT config_id, config_value, config_name FROM configurations;
SELECT user_id, role, username FROM users;
SELECT * FROM security_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM security_policies;
SELECT * FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE pass_fail = true;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM security_policies WHERE policy_type = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM configurations WHERE config_value LIKE '%production%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM security_policies;
SELECT monitoring_id, date_checked, pass_fail FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE date_checked >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT config_name, config_value FROM configurations WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role IN ('Admin', 'Manager');
SELECT policy_name, policy_description, policy_type FROM security_policies WHERE policy_type IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE policy_id = (SELECT policy_id FROM security_policies WHERE policy_name = 'Data Encryption');
SELECT * FROM configurations ORDER BY config_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM users;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, policy_type FROM security_policies WHERE policy_type LIKE '%Access%';
SELECT monitoring_id, date_checked FROM compliance_monitoring WHERE pass_fail = false ORDER BY date_checked ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'Analyst' OR role = 'Developer';
SELECT config_id, policy_id, config_name, config_value FROM configurations WHERE config_value IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT policy_id) FROM configurations;
SELECT * FROM SecurityPolicies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_type, policy_status FROM SecurityPolicies;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceMonitoring;
SELECT monitor_type, monitor_status FROM ComplianceMonitoring;
SELECT * FROM ConfigurationSettings;
SELECT setting_name, setting_type FROM ConfigurationSettings;
SELECT * FROM AuditingLogs;
SELECT log_type, log_message FROM AuditingLogs;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email, role FROM Users;
SELECT * FROM SecurityPolicies WHERE policy_status = 'enabled';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE monitor_status = 'fail';
SELECT * FROM ConfigurationSettings WHERE setting_type = 'numeric';
SELECT * FROM AuditingLogs WHERE log_type = 'error';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM SecurityPolicies WHERE policy_type = 'network';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE monitor_type = 'daily';
SELECT * FROM ConfigurationSettings WHERE setting_name = 'Encryption';
SELECT * FROM AuditingLogs WHERE log_timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE last_login < '2021-06-01';
SELECT * FROM SecurityPolicies WHERE policy_status = 'enabled';
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM SecurityPolicies WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE monitor_type = 'daily' AND monitor_status = 'fail';
SELECT policy_name, COUNT(*) AS num_monitors FROM SecurityPolicies JOIN ComplianceMonitoring ON SecurityPolicies.policy_id = ComplianceMonitoring.policy_id GROUP BY policy_name;
SELECT Users.username, Users.email, SecurityPolicies.policy_name FROM Users INNER JOIN SecurityPolicies ON Users.user_id = SecurityPolicies.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM ConfigurationSettings WHERE setting_type = 'numeric' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT log_type, COUNT(*) AS num_logs FROM AuditingLogs GROUP BY log_type;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin' AND last_login < '2022-06-01';

SELECT SecurityPolicies.policy_id, SecurityPolicies.policy_name, ComplianceMonitoring.monitor_type FROM SecurityPolicies LEFT JOIN ComplianceMonitoring ON SecurityPolicies.policy_id = ComplianceMonitoring.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM AuditingLogs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-03-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = (SELECT MAX(user_id) FROM Users);
SELECT * FROM ConfigurationSettings WHERE setting_name LIKE '%security%' AND created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT setting_type FROM ConfigurationSettings;
SELECT * FROM Users ORDER BY last_login DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, policy_description, policy_type FROM SecurityPolicies WHERE policy_id IN (SELECT policy_id FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE monitor_status = 'fail');
SELECT * FROM ComplianceMonitoring WHERE policy_id IN (SELECT policy_id FROM SecurityPolicies WHERE policy_status = 'disabled');
SELECT Users.username, COUNT(*) AS num_policies FROM Users JOIN SecurityPolicies ON Users.user_id = SecurityPolicies.policy_id GROUP BY Users.username;
SELECT policy_name, monitor_type, monitor_date FROM SecurityPolicies JOIN ComplianceMonitoring ON SecurityPolicies.policy_id = ComplianceMonitoring.policy_id WHERE monitor_status = 'fail';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_admins FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM AuditingLogs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-02-28' AND log_type = 'error';
